alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:04AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WAYNE, UNION AND FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA THROUGH 930 AM EDT... At 903 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Glenwood, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Connersville, Centerville, Cambridge City, Liberty, Hagerstown, Fountain City, Dublin, Franklin, Salem, Waterloo, Columbia, Bunker Hill, Abington, Brownsville, Greens Fork, East Germantown, Spring Grove, Bethel and Economy. This includes I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
